mapper.select: SELECT ID , WORD_NM , ENG_ABBR_NM , ENG_NM, EXPLN , STAT, CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_word_dictionary WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID , WORD_NM , ENG_ABBR_NM , ENG_NM, EXPLN , STAT, CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_word_dictionary WHERE WORD_NM = #{wordNm}

SELECT ID , WORD_NM , ENG_ABBR_NM , ENG_NM, EXPLN , STAT, CRT_ID, UPD_ID , date_format(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_word_dictionary WHERE ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT A.ID , A.WORD_NM , A.ENG_ABBR_NM , A.ENG_NM, A.EXPLN , B.CD_NM STAT, A.CRT_ID, A.UPD_ID , date_format(A.CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CRT_DTTM , date_format(A.UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTTM FROM tb_word_dictionary A LEFT JOIN tb_code B ON B.GRP_CD = 'STAT' AND B.CD = A.STAT WHERE 1=1
AND A.WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wordNm}, '%')
AND A.ENG_ABBR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{engAbbrNm}, '%')
AND A.STAT = #{stat}
ORDER BY A.WORD_NM, A.ENG_NM
SELECT WORD_NM AS KOR_NM , ENG_ABBR_NM AS ENG_NM FROM tb_word_dictionary WHERE 1=1
